reporter_caption.center: AKEN v. BARNET AUFSESSER KNITTING COMPANY, 192 N.Y. 554 (1908)

caption.center: JAMES H. AKEN, Respondent, v. BARNET AUFSESSER KNITTING COMPANY,

court.center: Court of Appeals of the State of New York.

opinion.attorneys:
Murray Downs for appellant.
Daniel C. McElwain and James H. Berns for respondent.
opinion.opinion_text:
Order affirmed and judgment absolute ordered against appellant on the stipulation, with costs in all courts; no opinion.
Concur: CULLEN, Ch. J., GRAY, HAIGHT, VANN, WILLARD BARTLETT, HISCOCK and CHASE, JJ.
